intro: What truly drives me is curiosity, not just for the systems I build, but for the world that sustains us.
middle: When I’m not deep in technology, you’ll likely find me engaging in meaningful conversations about sustainable agriculture or the quiet art of traditional food preservation. Whether it’s swapping recipes for homemade preserves or learning the best way to sun-dry fruits, I see these exchanges as a vital way to connect with different cultures and honor our roots..
end: For me, building technology is no different from farming or slow-cooking: it requires patience, balance, and a deep sense of care. These interests ground my work, reminding me that the best solutions aren't just efficient—they are built to last and designed to create genuine value for the people who use them.
